añjanavasabha：añjanavasabha（pu）
အဉ္ဇနဝသဘ（ပု）
[añjana+vasabha]
[အဉ္ဇန+ဝသဘ]

Añjanavasabha：The state elephant of Dhanañjaya，king of the Kurus.



It was credited with the power of bringing rain； the brahmins of Dantapura in Kalinga，therefore，begged for it during a severe drought.



But the elephant was of no avail，the rain did not come，and so it was returned to Dhanañjaya. J.ii.368f.； DhA.iv.88f.

añjanavasabha：＂အဉ္ဇနဝသဘ（ပု）
[အဉ္ဇန+ဝသဘ]
အဉ္ဇနဝသဘအမည်ရှိသော၊ ဆင်။
